archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.3.6e: e) supported by sensors to supplement and enhance other data sources, typically installed at an infrastructure level (e.g. IDS, IPS and Network Behaviour Analysis (NBA))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
